content.text:
[@SoapDog (Macbook)](@qv10rF4IsmxRZb7g5ekJ33EakYBpdrmV/vtP1ij5BS4=.ed25519) 

You might like [discovery-swarm](https://github.com/mafintosh/discovery-swarm), which can find peers locally (with mDNS) and globally. I've been super tempted to join a "room" identified by our shared SHS key to connect to every other online peer. The bummer is that it leaks your IP to everyone which is problematic from a privacy perspective.
